name: C. Artem and Array
statement:
Artem has an array of positive integers. Artem decided to play with it.
The game consists of moves. Each move goes like this. Artem chooses some
element of the array and removes it. For that, he gets points, where and
are numbers that were adjacent with the removed number. If the number
doesn’t have an adjacent number to the left or right, Artem doesn’t get
any points. After the element is removed, the two parts of the array
glue together resulting in the new array that Artem continues playing
with. Borya wondered what maximum total number of points Artem can get
as he plays this game.
